title: The ascent
body: Is this ascent thing a taric rework or new champ?

replies.body: Taric rework. He's getting a sword :O
thank you will he be a sup still or a fighter because of sword?

> [{quoted}](name=Death star giant,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=GpXXi3lB,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-04-05T07:17:35.971+0000)
>
> thank you will he be a sup still or a fighter because of sword?

He doesn't have a sword.
It's going to be a mace apparently. **Riot Reav3** was talking about it on the NA forums a few hours ago.

> [{quoted}](name=EzeBlood,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=GpXXi3lB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-05T07:16:24.468+0000)
>
> Taric rework. He's getting a sword :O

He doesn't have a sword.
